features.desc_en: Leverage AI algorithms to automate tasks, gain insights, and drive innovation.
features.desc_id: Manfaatkan algoritma AI untuk mengotomatisasi tugas, memperoleh wawasan, dan mendorong inovasi.
features.learn_more_desc_en: AI enables organizations to operationalize data, automate complex workflows, and unlock new business capabilities.
features.learn_more_desc_id: AI memungkinkan organisasi mengoptimalkan data, mengotomatisasi proses kompleks, dan membuka kemampuan bisnis baru.

header_learn_more.desc_en: Forecast trends and behavior using machine learning.
header_learn_more.desc_id: Prediksi tren dan perilaku menggunakan machine learning.

header_learn_more.desc_en: Reduce repetitive tasks and increase efficiency.
header_learn_more.desc_id: Mengurangi tugas berulang dan meningkatkan efisiensi.

portofolio_learn_more.desc_en: AI model that predicts sales and product needs.
portofolio_learn_more.desc_id: Model AI yang memprediksi penjualan dan kebutuhan produk.

team_learn_more.name: Dr. Daniel Hart
team_learn_more.message_en: We focus on delivering practical AI solutions.
team_learn_more.message_id: Kami berfokus pada penerapan solusi AI yang nyata.

features.desc_en: Connect and control devices through IoT networks to enable smarter environments.
features.desc_id: Hubungkan dan kontrol perangkat melalui jaringan IoT untuk menciptakan lingkungan yang lebih cerdas.
features.learn_more_desc_en: IoT connects devices, enabling automation, monitoring, and remote intelligence.
features.learn_more_desc_id: IoT menghubungkan perangkat sehingga dapat melakukan otomatisasi, pemantauan, dan pengendalian jarak jauh.

header_learn_more.desc_en: Automate business workflows using smart sensors.
header_learn_more.desc_id: Otomatisasi proses bisnis menggunakan sensor pintar.

portofolio_learn_more.desc_en: IoT sensors for production line monitoring.
portofolio_learn_more.desc_id: Sensor IoT untuk memantau lini produksi.

team_learn_more.name: Sarah Levine
team_learn_more.message_en: IoT provides a new dimension of efficiency.
team_learn_more.message_id: IoT memberi dimensi baru bagi efisiensi.

features.desc_en: Integrate devices into a unified smart home ecosystem for safety, comfort, and efficiency.
features.desc_id: Integrasikan berbagai perangkat rumah ke dalam ekosistem pintar untuk keamanan, kenyamanan, dan efisiensi.
features.learn_more_title_en: Smarter Living with Smart Home Technology
features.learn_more_title_id: Hidup Lebih Cerdas dengan Teknologi Rumah Pintar
features.learn_more_desc_en: Smart home systems enhance convenience, energy efficiency, and overall home safety.
features.learn_more_desc_id: Sistem rumah pintar meningkatkan kenyamanan, efisiensi energi, dan keamanan rumah.

header_learn_more.desc_en: Automated lighting based on user behavior.
Monitoring and alert systems integrated into your home.
header_learn_more.desc_id: Sistem pemantauan dan peringatan yang terintegrasi.

portofolio_learn_more.desc_en: Full automation of a modern apartment.

team_learn_more.name: Kevin Ross
team_learn_more.message_en: We build homes that adapt to your lifestyle.
team_learn_more.message_id: Kami membangun rumah yang menyesuaikan gaya hidup Anda.

features.desc_en: Manage software lifecycles, updates, and deployments to ensure stability and scalability.
features.desc_id: Kelola siklus hidup, pembaruan, dan distribusi perangkat lunak agar sistem tetap stabil dan efisien.
features.learn_more_title_id: Manajemen Siklus Hidup Software yang Optimal
features.learn_more_desc_en: Ensure applications remain scalable, secure, and efficient with proper software lifecycle strategy.
features.learn_more_desc_id: Memastikan aplikasi tetap skalabel, aman, dan efisien dengan strategi manajemen siklus hidup software.

header_learn_more.desc_en: Keep track of software changes across teams.
header_learn_more.desc_id: Melacak perubahan software di seluruh tim.

header_learn_more.desc_en: Automate testing and deployment for reliability.
header_learn_more.desc_id: Otomatisasi testing dan deployment untuk keandalan.

team_learn_more.name: Laura Kim
team_learn_more.message_en: We ensure software stays fast, reliable, and scalable.
team_learn_more.message_id: Kami memastikan software tetap cepat, stabil, dan mudah diskalakan.
